location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter No. 2: William Digges Latouche, Resident at Bussora [Basra], to Edward Galley, Resident at Bushire

mods.abstract: In this letter William Digges Latouche reports on the movement of a Dutch messenger's packets from Bunderick [Bandar-e RÄ«g]. He suggests that the time added to the packets' journey will be of very little consequence to those to whom they are directed.
